entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY ENDED, Dempster (Highway)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:56 p.m. MST Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming east 20 km/h late in the morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Cloudy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. High minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Blowing snow. Windy. Low minus 19. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow and blowing snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Blowing snow. Windy. High minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Blowing snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Blowing snow. Windy. Low minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Blowing snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Blowing snow. Windy. High minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Blowing snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Blowing snow. Windy. Low minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow. Windy. High minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 18 April 2023
